pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body:
### PR summary [c876e807d7](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/14203/commits/c876e807d7eb92a6749370ef0862e4329ac1e0e2)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.Algebra.Category.ModuleCat.Descent`|1536|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ extendScalarsComonadic`
`+ instance (G : Comonad C) : (Comonad.comparison G.adj).EssSurj where`
`+ instance (G : Comonad C) : (Comonad.comparison G.adj).Full where`
`+ instance (G : Comonad C) : ComonadicLeftAdjoint G.forget where`
`+ instance (L : C ⥤ D) [ComonadicLeftAdjoint L] :`
`+ instance (L : C ⥤ D) [ComonadicLeftAdjoint L] : L.IsLeftAdjoint :=`
`+ instance (R : D ⥤ C) [MonadicRightAdjoint R] :`
`+ instance (R : D ⥤ C) [MonadicRightAdjoint R] : R.IsRightAdjoint :=`
`+ instance (T : Monad C) : (Monad.comparison T.adj).EssSurj where`
`+ instance (T : Monad C) : (Monad.comparison T.adj).Full where`
`+ instance (T : Monad C) : MonadicRightAdjoint T.forget where`
`+ instance (priority := 1) preservesSplitEqualizers (f g : X ⟶ Y) [HasSplitEqualizer f g] :`
`+ instance (priority := 100) comonadicOfCoreflective [Coreflective R] :`
`+ instance (priority := 100) monadicOfReflective [Reflective R] :`
`+ instance : Module A B := f.toAlgebra.toModule`
`+ instance : Module.Flat A ((restrictScalars f).obj (ModuleCat.of B B))`
`+ instance : PreservesFiniteLimits (extendScalars f) := by`
`+ instance : PreservesFiniteLimits <| tensorLeft ((restrictScalars f).obj (ModuleCat.of B B))`
`+ instance [Coreflective R] (X : (coreflectorAdjunction R).toComonad.Coalgebra) :`
`+ instance [R.Faithful] (h : L ⊣ R) : (Monad.comparison h).Faithful where`
`+ instance [Reflective R] (X : (reflectorAdjunction R).toMonad.Algebra) :`
`+ instance δ_iso_of_coreflective [Coreflective R] : IsIso (coreflectorAdjunction R).toComonad.δ := by`
`+ instance μ_iso_of_reflective [Reflective R] : IsIso (reflectorAdjunction R).toMonad.μ := by`
`+-+- comparison_essSurj`
`+-+- comparison_full`
`- instance (G : Comonad C) : (Comonad.comparison G.adj).EssSurj`
`- instance (G : Comonad C) : (Comonad.comparison G.adj).Full`
`- instance (G : Comonad C) : ComonadicLeftAdjoint G.forget`
`- instance (L : C ⥤ D) [ComonadicLeftAdjoint L] :`
`- instance (L : C ⥤ D) [ComonadicLeftAdjoint L] : L.IsLeftAdjoint`
`- instance (R : D ⥤ C) [MonadicRightAdjoint R] :`
`- instance (R : D ⥤ C) [MonadicRightAdjoint R] : R.IsRightAdjoint`
`- instance (T : Monad C) : (Monad.comparison T.adj).EssSurj`
`- instance (T : Monad C) : (Monad.comparison T.adj).Full`
`- instance (T : Monad C) : MonadicRightAdjoint T.forget`
`- instance (priority := 100) comonadicOfCoreflective [Coreflective R] :`
`- instance (priority := 100) monadicOfReflective [Reflective R] :`
`- instance [Coreflective R] (X : (coreflectorAdjunction R).toComonad.Coalgebra) :`
`- instance [R.Faithful] (h : L ⊣ R) : (Monad.comparison h).Faithful`
`- instance [Reflective R] (X : (reflectorAdjunction R).toMonad.Algebra) :`
`- instance δ_iso_of_coreflective [Coreflective R] : IsIso (coreflectorAdjunction R).toComonad.δ := by`
`- instance μ_iso_of_reflective [Reflective R] : IsIso (reflectorAdjunction R).toMonad.μ := by`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>
The diff in `Monad.Adjunction` makes no sense. The file is unchanged

pullRequest.title: feat(Algebra/ModuleCat): descent data
